name: Avoid Artifacts with Subqueries (EGL)
description: This rule searches for all artifacts having queries with subqueries considered  as complex.
output: This report lists  the following information: Function full name, Number of SubQueries
rationale: Having complex queries in artifacts can cause performance problems. Queries with Subqueries is considered complex.
reference: Standard suggestions based on CAST Quality Model
remediation: review the source code in order to reduce the number of subqueries.

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - SQL and Data Handling Performance
